Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/18th
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage at Damen/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage at Damen/18th.

Allow extra travel time.
